DellNetworkAdapter.description: This property shall represent the Oem properties for a NetworkAdapter resource.
DellNetworkAdapter.longDescription: This property shall represent the Oem properties for a NetworkAdapter resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PLDMMonitoringEnabled.description: An indication of whether monitoring and controling for PLDM device is enabled for NetworkAdapter.
PLDMMonitoringEnabled.longDescription: This property shall indicate whether monitoring and controling for pldm device is enabled for NetworkAdapter.
